import React from 'react'; const Home = () => { // Styles CSS en tant qu'objets JavaScript const styles = { container: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#f6f5f7', fontFamily: "'Poppins', sans-serif", }, formContainer: { backgroundColor: '#fff', borderRadius: '10px', boxShadow: '0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,0.25), 0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.22)', width: '100%', maxWidth: '800px', minHeight: '480px', overflow: 'hidden', position: 'relative', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', '@media (minWidth: 768px)': { flexDirection: 'row', }, }, form: { padding: '40px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', width: '100%', '@media (minWidth: 768px)': { width: '50%', }, }, title: { fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '20px', }, socialContainer: { margin: '20px 0', }, socialButton: { border: '1px solid #DDD', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'inline-flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', margin: '0 5px', height: '40px', width: '40px', textDecoration: 'none', color: '#333', }, inputGroup: { width: '100%', marginBottom: '15px', position: 'relative', }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '10px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid #ddd', outline: 'none', }, button: { backgroundColor: '#141E30', color: '#fff', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '5px', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', marginTop: '10px', }, overlayContainer: { position: 'absolute', top: 0, left: '50%', width: '50%', height: '100%', overflow: 'hidden', transition: 'transform 0.6s ease-in-out', zIndex: 100, '@media (maxWidth: 767px)': { display: 'none', }, }, overlay: { background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #141E30, #243B55)', color: '#fff', position: 'relative', height: '100%', width: '200%', transform: 'translateX(0)', transition: 'transform 0.6s ease-in-out', }, overlayPanel: { position: 'absolute', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', padding: '0 40px', textAlign: 'center', top: 0, height: '100%', width: '50%', transform: 'translateX(0)', transition: 'transform 0.6s ease-in-out', }, overlayButton: { backgroundColor: 'transparent', border: '1px solid #fff', color: '#fff', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '5px', cursor: 'pointer', marginTop: '20px', }, footer: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '20px', left: '50%', transform: 'translateX(-50%)', }, footerLink: { color: '#141E30', textDecoration: 'none', fontWeight: 'bold', }, }; return (
